agency_name: Department of Housing and Community Development
series_description: This series documents the investigations, analysis, findings, adjudications, hearings, and/or decisions of any agreement, case, mediation, or negotiation that comes before the Commission or in which the Commission may participate that may include, but is not limited to: annexation and immunity annexation proposals, boundary settlements or adjustments, interlocal economic growth-sharing agreements, interlocal settlement agreements, and governmental status transitions. This series may include, but is not limited to: bibliographies, correspondence, evidence, exhibits, maps, minutes, photographs, recordings, reports, and transcripts

agency_name: Department of Housing and Community Development
series_description: This series documents the Commissionâ€™s process, in cooperation with all executive agencies, for assessing, and the completed assessments of, state mandates on local governments. This series may include, but is not limited to, assessment schedules, correspondence, and forms
retention_statement: 4 Years after end of state fiscal year
